name: Resources Connection
overview: Resources Connection LLC, doing business as Resources Global Professionals, Inc., operates as a professional services company. It solves problems, executes, and transfers knowledge. The company provides intellectual capital and execution capability services across business disciplines, such as finance and accounting, internal audit, human capital, information management, supply chain management, and legal services. Resources Connection also offers policyIQ, a content management application that helps to document and communicate policies, procedures, and internal controls to track employee compliance. It serves aerospace, biotech, consumer, energy, financial services, government, insurance, mining, pharmaceutical, retail, technology, transportation, automotive, construction, education, entertainment, gaming, healthcare, manufacturing, non-profit, real estate, services, telecommunications, and utilities industries. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Costa Mesa, California with practice offices in Europe, the United Kingdom, Asia Pacific, and North America. Resources Connection LLC is a subsidiary of Resources Connection, Inc.

acquisitions.source_description: Resources Connection Completes Acquisition of Sitrick And Company and Brincko Associates, Forms New Corporate Advisory and Restructuring Subsidiary

company.name: Sitrick And Company and Brincko Associates
